name: HealthAdvocate
description: Offers a wide range of health and wellness services, including assistance with navigating the healthcare system, personalized health coaching, and chronic condition management.

name: Johnson & Johnson Health and Wellness Solutions
description: Provides a suite of digital health tools and resources for employers, healthcare providers, and individuals.

name: Cerner Health Services
description: Offers a variety of health and wellness solutions for employers, including employee health assessments, wellness coaching, and disease management programs.

name: Welltok
description: Offers a comprehensive suite of health and wellness solutions for individuals, employers, and health plans, including personalized health coaching, wellness challenges, and digital health tracking tools.

name: Mercer Health & Benefits
description: Provides a range of health and benefits consulting services, including health plan design, pharmacy benefit management, and health and wellness program implementation.

name: Optum
description: Offers a variety of health and wellness solutions for employers and health plans, including health coaching, wellness programs, and population health management.

name: The Advisory Board Company
description: Provides healthcare consulting services to hospitals and health systems, including strategic planning, revenue cycle management, and clinical performance improvement.

name: EY Health
description: Offers a range of consulting services for healthcare providers and payers, including healthcare strategy, digital transformation, and regulatory compliance.

name: PwC Health Industries
description: Provides a wide range of healthcare consulting services, including healthcare strategy, digital transformation, and regulatory compliance.

name: Deloitte Health
description: Offers a range of healthcare consulting services, including healthcare strategy, clinical transformation, and health system integration.

name: WebMD
description: WebMD provides trusted health information, news, and expert advice to consumers.

name: Healthline
description: Healthline offers medically reviewed articles, news, and health information for consumers.

name: Mayo Clinic
description: The Mayo Clinic is a nonprofit academic medical center that provides expert care and research in the field of medicine.

name: Everyday Health
description: Everyday Health is a resource for consumers seeking information on health and wellness topics.

name: MedicineNet
description: MedicineNet provides easy-to-read, in-depth medical information for consumers.

name: Verywell Health
description: Verywell Health provides comprehensive health information and news for consumers.

name: National Institutes of Health
description: The National Institutes of Health (NIH) is the nation's medical research agency and conducts scientific research on health and disease.

name: Cleveland Clinic
description: The Cleveland Clinic is a nonprofit multispecialty academic medical center that provides patient care, research, and education.

name: Harvard Health
description: Harvard Health provides health information and advice from experts at Harvard Medical School.

name: Johns Hopkins Medicine
description: Johns Hopkins Medicine is a nonprofit academic medical center that provides patient care, research, and education.
